name: Survivors (itch) (Bumblebeans)
description:
Survivors You are the commander of the Time Tank, a formidable vehicle that ensures the fight is never truly over, stranded on an alien planet with nothing but your wits, heavy weaponry, and the allies you rescue along the way. Battle through hordes of eldritch monsters to rescue your friends, upgrade your arsenal, and claw your way into the future.  Controls: WASD to move, left click to navigate UI ------------------------------------------

Developed for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2
